title: Cajun Chicken & Spiced Quinoa
directions: 1. Rinse quinoa well under cold water and place in a saucepan with the stock. Bring to boil over high heat then reduce heat to low and simmer, covered for 10 minutes or until just tender. Remove from heat and set aside, covered.
2. Meanwhile for the chicken, mix the seasoning, lime juice and coriander in a bowl. Let chicken sit in the mixture for 5 minutes.

3. Heat the coconut oil in a saucepan and add the vegetables, spices and garlic. Cook until carrot has softened. Add vegetable mix to the quinoa and stiry in parsley, lemon juice and season with salt and pepper.
4. Heat some more coconut oil over a grill or fry pan and grill chicken over medium to high heat until it is cooked through.
ingredients: 1 cup of low sodium chicken or vegetable stock
